relevant_findings.general: Elderly man, alert, oriented, uncomfortable with movement in bed, ambulatory
relevant_findings.lungs: CTA bilaterally, no wheezes, rhonchi, or crackles
relevant_findings.heart: RRR, normal S1 S2, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops. Sternal scar consistent with CABG
